WHETHER A NON - AUTOMATIC IMPORT LICENSING PROCEDURE CAN ALSO BE A PROHIBITED QUANTITATIVE RESTRICTION UNDER ARTICLE XI OF GATT .Argentina 's submission notes that the complainants have alleged that the DJAI procedure is a non - automatic import licensing procedure that is subject to the Import Licensing Agreement and that the DJAI procedure is also a prohibited quantitative restriction under Article XI of GATT .

text: The WTO was established in January 1st , 1995 at the Uruguay Round .The number of members that it has currently is 153 countries .Some of its main functions are : Administering WTO trade agreements , forum for trade negotiations , handling trade disputes , monitoring national trade policies , technical assistance and training for developing countries , cooperation with other international organizations such as the United Nations .
